title: What is the most advanced robot to date? - Quora

response.answer_text: The most advanced humanoid robot to date has been developed by a team of researchers at the University of Tokyo. Named Kengoro, the robot has been made as similar to humans as current technology allows. Kengoro is the most advanced because he is the latest model, they have made two others previously.
any flagship smartphone. robot does not need to look like humans. human like is done by boston dynamics. non-human are many, including the autonomous cars being tested by google and like.
